Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to daily devotional raga mantra like om mantra, durga mantra, krishna mantra, gayatri mantra, ganesha mantra, shiv mantra, sai mantra, vishnu mantra, buddha mantra. Listen everyday to meditate, release daily stress and for positive life.
